description:
ReservePolicy._calculateRebalanceAmounts(LiquidityTypes.Context) (contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#111-166) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- token0ToRemove18 = ((oraclePriceNumerator - poolPriceNumerator) * LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR) / contractionDenominator (contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#155-156)
	- token1ToAdd18 = (token0ToRemove18 * ctx.prices.oracleNum * (LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR - ctx.incentiveBps)) / (ctx.prices.oracleDen * LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR) (contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#157-159)
markdown:
[ReservePolicy._calculateRebalanceAmounts(LiquidityTypes.Context)](contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#L111-L166) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [token0ToRemove18 = ((oraclePriceNumerator - poolPriceNumerator) * LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR) / contractionDenominator](contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#L155-L156)
	- [token1ToAdd18 = (token0ToRemove18 * ctx.prices.oracleNum * (LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR - ctx.incentiveBps)) / (ctx.prices.oracleDen * LiquidityTypes.BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR)](contracts/v3/ReservePolicy.sol#L157-L159)

description:
Reentrancy in LiquidityController.rebalance(address) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#139-174):
	External calls:
	- ok = strategy.execute(action) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#160)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- poolConfigs[pool].lastRebalance = uint128(block.timestamp) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#171)
	LiquidityController.poolConfigs (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#32) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- LiquidityController.addPool(address,address,address,uint64,uint32) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#55-85)
	- LiquidityController.poolConfigs (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#32)
	- LiquidityController.removePool(address) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#88-93)
	- LiquidityController.setRebalanceCooldown(address,uint64) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#96-100)
	- LiquidityController.setRebalanceIncentive(address,uint32) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#103-109)

description: LiquidityController.rebalance(address) (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#139-174) ignores return value by (None,None,None,None,diffAfter,None) = IFPMM(pool).getPrices() (contracts/v3/LiquidityController.sol#172)

description:
Reentrancy in ReserveLiquidityStrategy.execute(LiquidityTypes.Action) (contracts/v3/ReserveLiquidityStrategy.sol#103-125):
	External calls:
	- IFPMM(action.pool).rebalance(action.amount0Out,action.amount1Out,hookData) (contracts/v3/ReserveLiquidityStrategy.sol#114)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LiquidityMoved(action.pool,action.dir,action.inputAmount,action.amount0Out + action.amount1Out,incentiveAmount) (contracts/v3/ReserveLiquidityStrategy.sol#116-122)
